solution_line_template: In each compartment, there are two pennies, and when she adds 6 pennies to each compartment, one compartment will have {pennies_added_per_compartment}+{pennies_per_compartment_initial} = {pennies_per_compartment_final} pennies.

If there are {num_compartments} compartments, and each compartment now contains {pennies_per_compartment_final} pennies, there are a total of {num_compartments}*{pennies_per_compartment_final} = <<{num_compartments}*{pennies_per_compartment_final}={total_pennies}>>{total_pennies} pennies in all the compartments.
